mapper.insert: insert into bonuspointrecord (optUser_id, type, amount, optDate, remark, member_id) values (#{optUser.id}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{optDate}, #{remark}, #{member.id})
mapper.update: update bonuspointrecord set optUser_id = #{optUser.id}, type = #{type}, amount = #{amount}, optDate = #{optDate}, remark = #{remark}, member_id = #{member.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, optUser_id, type, amount, optDate, remark, member_id from bonuspointrecord
